text: Khoroshikh i tuchnykh zhivotnykh My naznachili dlya zhertvennykh vashikh prinosheniy Bogu; za nikh vam budet dobro. Proiznosite imya Bozhiye nad nimi, kogda oni stoyat strenozhennyye; kogda oni, upadshi, perestanut dyshat', togda yesh'te myaso ikh i nakormite im bednogo, prosyashchego u vas, i nishchego, ne smeyushchego prosit'. My pokorili ikh vam, predpolagaya, chto budete blagodarny
